languages.text: Время, проведенное на одном мире с мон-кай, заставило провидца Муарана о многом задуматься. Когда Врата Паутины пробудились на Янусе и отряды эльдарских рейнджеров ступили на мир предков, он не допустил резни. Даровав Лилэтан и его новым несмышленым жителям свое благословение, он исчез в сияющем портале, отправившись навстречу новому дому.

Time spent on the same world as mon-keigh pushed the Farseer Muaran toward reflection. When the Webway Gate awoke on Janus and squads of Aeldari rangers stepped onto their ancestors' world, he averted a bloodbath. Granting the Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.
languages.original_text: Время, проведенное на одном мире с мон-кай, заставило провидца Муарана о многом задуматься. Когда Врата Паутины пробудились на Янусе и отряды эльдарских рейнджеров ступили на мир предков, он не допустил резни. Даровав Лилэтан и его новым несмышленым жителям свое благословение, он исчез в сияющем портале, отправившись навстречу новому дому.

traits.locale_text: Time spent on the world with mon-keigh pushed Farseer Muaran to think over a lot of things. When Webway Gate awoke on Janus and squads of Aeldari rangers stepped on their ancestors' world, he averted the possible bloodbath. Granting Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

When Webway Gate awoke on Janus and squads of Aeldari rangers stepped on their ancestors' world, he averted the possible bloodbath. Granting Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

Granting the Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

Granting the Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

Time spent on the same world as mon-keigh pushed the Farseer Muaran toward reflection. When the Webway Gate awoke on Janus and squads of Aeldari rangers stepped onto their ancestors' world, he averted a bloodbath. Granting the Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

languages.text: 与猴子共同生活的经历，让先知穆兰进行了反思。随着加努斯网道大门的开启，艾达灵族游侠小队踏上了曾属于他们祖先的世界。不过，先知穆兰及时出手干预，避免了一场血腥屠杀。先知祝福了莉莱赞和它新一代的纯真居民，之后消失在了闪闪发光的传送门中，前往新的家园。
languages.original_text: Time spent on the same world as mon-keigh pushed the Farseer Muaran toward reflection. When the Webway Gate awoke on Janus and squads of Aeldari rangers stepped onto their ancestors' world, he averted a bloodbath. Granting the Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

traits.locale_text: 与猴子共同生活的经历，让先知穆兰进行了反思。随着加努斯网道大门的开启，艾达灵族游侠小队踏上了曾属于他们祖先的世界。不过，先知穆兰及时出手干预，避免了一场血腥屠杀。先知祝福了莉莱赞和它新一代的纯真居民，之后消失在了闪闪发光的传送门中，前往新的家园。

languages.text: Der Runenprophet Muaran geriet durch die Zeit, die er auf einer Welt mit Chem-Pan-Sey verbrachte, ins Nachdenken. Als das Netzportal auf Janus erwachte und Trupps von Aeldari-Weltenläufern auf die Welt ihrer Ahnen traten, verhinderte er ein Blutbad. Er gab der Lileath und ihren neuen und naiven Bewohnern seinen Segen, verschwand durch ein glänzendes Portal und machte sich auf in eine neue Heimat.
languages.original_text: Time spent on the same world as mon-keigh pushed the Farseer Muaran toward reflection. When the Webway Gate awoke on Janus and squads of Aeldari rangers stepped onto their ancestors' world, he averted a bloodbath. Granting the Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

traits.locale_text: Der Runenprophet Muaran geriet durch die Zeit, die er auf einer Welt mit Chem-Pan-Sey verbrachte, ins Nachdenken. Als das Netzportal auf Janus erwachte und Trupps von Aeldari-Weltenläufern auf die Welt ihrer Ahnen traten, verhinderte er ein Blutbad. Er gab der Lileath und ihren neuen und naiven Bewohnern seinen Segen, verschwand durch ein glänzendes Portal und machte sich auf in eine neue Heimat.

languages.text: Le temps que le Grand Prophète Muaran avait passé sur le même monde que des mon-keigh lui avait donné matière à réflexion. Lorsque le portail sur la Toile s'ouvrit sur Janus et que des escouades entières de rangers aeldaris foulèrent le monde de leurs ancêtres, il évita un bain de sang. Après avoir offert sa bénédiction à la lilaethan ainsi qu'à ses nouveaux citoyens bien naïfs, il disparut par un portail étincelant et se mit en quête d'un nouveau foyer.
languages.original_text: Time spent on the same world as mon-keigh pushed the Farseer Muaran toward reflection. When the Webway Gate awoke on Janus and squads of Aeldari rangers stepped onto their ancestors' world, he averted a bloodbath. Granting the Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

traits.locale_text: Le temps que le Grand Prophète Muaran avait passé sur le même monde que des mon-keigh lui avait donné matière à réflexion. Lorsque le portail sur la Toile s'ouvrit sur Janus et que des escouades entières de rangers aeldaris foulèrent le monde de leurs ancêtres, il évita un bain de sang. Après avoir offert sa bénédiction à la lilaethan ainsi qu'à ses nouveaux citoyens bien naïfs, il disparut par un portail étincelant et se mit en quête d'un nouveau foyer.

languages.text: El tiempo que pasó en el mismo mundo que los mon-keigh llevó al vidente Muaran a la reflexión. Cuando el Portal de la Telaraña se abrió en Janus y escuadrones de exploradores Aeldari llegaron al mundo de sus ancestros, evitó que se produjera un baño de sangre. Tras conceder su bendición al Lilaethan y a sus nuevos e ingenuos habitantes, desapareció a través del brillante portal hacia su nuevo hogar.
languages.original_text: Time spent on the same world as mon-keigh pushed the Farseer Muaran toward reflection. When the Webway Gate awoke on Janus and squads of Aeldari rangers stepped onto their ancestors' world, he averted a bloodbath. Granting the Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

traits.locale_text: El tiempo que pasó en el mismo mundo que los mon-keigh llevó al vidente Muaran a la reflexión. Cuando el Portal de la Telaraña se abrió en Janus y escuadrones de exploradores Aeldari llegaron al mundo de sus ancestros, evitó que se produjera un baño de sangre. Tras conceder su bendición al Lilaethan y a sus nuevos e ingenuos habitantes, desapareció a través del brillante portal hacia su nuevo hogar.

languages.text: モン＝ケイと同じ世界で過ごした時間は、先見司ムアランを内省へと駆り立てた。網辻門がヤヌスに出現し、アエルダリのレンジャーたちが自分たちの父祖の惑星に足を踏み入れたとき、彼は血の惨劇を回避した。リラエタンとその新しくやってきた素朴な市民に祝福を与えると、彼は光り輝くポータルから姿を消し、新たな故郷へと旅立った。
languages.original_text: Time spent on the same world as mon-keigh pushed the Farseer Muaran toward reflection. When the Webway Gate awoke on Janus and squads of Aeldari rangers stepped onto their ancestors' world, he averted a bloodbath. Granting the Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

traits.locale_text: モン＝ケイと同じ世界で過ごした時間は、先見司ムアランを内省へと駆り立てた。網辻門がヤヌスに出現し、アエルダリのレンジャーたちが自分たちの父祖の惑星に足を踏み入れたとき、彼は血の惨劇を回避した。リラエタンとその新しくやってきた素朴な市民に祝福を与えると、彼は光り輝くポータルから姿を消し、新たな故郷へと旅立った。

languages.text: Mon-keighlerle aynı dünyada zaman geçirmek, Ötesezen Muaran'ın bakış açısını değiştirdi. Janus'taki Ağyol Geçidi'nin uyanması sonrası atalarının dünyasına adım atan mangalarca korucu Aeldari'nin katliam yapmasının önüne geçti. Lilaethan'a ve onun yeni halkına iyi dileklerini bahşettikten sonra kendisine yeni bir yuva bulmak için parıldayan bir portaldan geçip ortadan kayboldu.
languages.original_text: Time spent on the same world as mon-keigh pushed the Farseer Muaran toward reflection. When the Webway Gate awoke on Janus and squads of Aeldari rangers stepped onto their ancestors' world, he averted a bloodbath. Granting the Lilaethan and its new and naive citizens his blessing, he disappeared through a shining portal, departing for a new home.

traits.locale_text: Mon-keighlerle aynı dünyada zaman geçirmek, Ötesezen Muaran'ın bakış açısını değiştirdi. Janus'taki Ağyol Geçidi uyandığında ve mangalarca Aeldari kolcusu atalarının dünyasına adım attığında, bir katliam yaşanmasının önüne geçti. Lilaethan'a ve onun yeni yerel halkına iyi dileklerini bahşettikten sonra kendisine yeni bir yuva bulmak için parıldayan bir portaldan geçerek ortadan kayboldu.
